name: Dumbocracy (Beta)
description:
Dumbocracy (Beta)

This game is in its beta release. As a warning to the player, there are two known bugs and one incomplete feature:

1. The game may freeze during the AI's turns. In order to get around that, click on the box with the word "week", and press the arrow that appears below.

2. The "Redraw Boundaries" feature may not always work, or the error messages may not appear. If this occurs, you will have to select another tile to shift instead.

3. The credits scene is empty. This will be filled soon.

Notes on the Mac and Windows versions:

1. The tutorial mouse and clicks may be offset upwards.
